str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Of little faith. From oligos and pistis; incredulous, i.e. Lacking confidence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Mustard (probably the shrub, not the herb). Perhaps from sinomai; mustard.
A kernel, grain, seed. Apparently a primary word; a kernel of seed.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.
This; he, she, it.
A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To change my place (abode), leave, depart, remove, pass over. From meta and the base of basis; to change place.
Here, in this place. From a prolonged form of en; properly, within, i.e. here, hither.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To change my place (abode), leave, depart, remove, pass over. From meta and the base of basis; to change place.
No one, none, nothing.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be impossible; I am unable. From adunatos; to be unable, i.e. impossible.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
